pages.text: $(o)"When the Threshold was closed, it was closed by flesh, a Gate. This Gate knows the Key, is the Key, and guards the way to the dreams of the Blind Idiot. Maybe it's existence is a blessing; who knows what can be found in the depths of Nothingness."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with the $(l:shaping/entry_lock)Closed Lock$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Mind$() aspect. It can also generate OE from $(t:Pain is a teacher, they say)$(t:It should be noted that the undead don't feel pain)$(o)pain...$()
